nodes.text: Star Wars: Empire: A Little Piece of Home
Star Wars: Empire: A Little Piece of Home was a 2-issue story arc of Star Wars: Empire published by Dark Horse Comics. It ran from May 26, 2004 to June 30, 2004.

Princess Leia of the Rebel Alliance has been visiting planets to find allies in the fight against the Galactic Empire. One visit takes her to the Panteer estate, home of two brothers from Alderaan. She is welcomed warmly by Raal Panteer. The two plan a trek into the jungle. Raal saves Leia's life but in turn loses his when he was bitten by a morp. The other brother Heeth Panteer finds them the next morning and grieving over his brother's body, tells Leia to leave and never come back.
